trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
Represents the method that handles a <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserError" /> event in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard" /> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventHandler> class represents the method that handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserError> event in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventHandler> classe representa o método que manipula o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserError> evento em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> controle.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventHandler> delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
